data.apath:
person .friend as fr .age as age .number
ffff(a, b, c)
a.`lalala`
a.prop('lalala')
a./fff/
a.prex('#.*')
func f(x, y) = @x+1,
const age = age,
person .ssn .~('#.*') .age
a?(b.~('#.*')).c
a?(b.match('#.*')).c
age
   .(if (x == 1)(
        xxx,
        zzz
    )if (x == 99)(   
        yyy
    )// else
        zzz
    )
person 
    .(
        fff(),
        friend ?(id == 1)
     ) as myFriend
        .age as age
            .dummy as@
                .number 
                    .{
                        x: @age + 'lalala' + _
                    }
